title: Issue with ibverbs support
body_html:
I tried the script in https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/imagenet/main.py
to train resnet50 on imagenet dataset. The default backend is gloo when trained on multiple GPUs. Just as the following code
parser.add_argument('--dist-backend', default='gloo', type=str, help='distributed backend').
I know that Pytorch use Gloo TCP by default. I wonder how to enable IBVERBS. Should I compile the gloo with GLOO_USE_IBVERBS=ON?
